name: Lovers Hell Ride - Free Racing and Shooting Game
name_original: Lovers Hell Ride - Free Racing and Shooting Game
description:
Get ready for the Highway Shooting experience of your life with Lovers Hell Ride! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes Shooting capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

You must use all of your Racing and Shooting skills to reach the end. You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many Cars trying to take you down.

Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!
